payload.content: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Health, an encrypted workspace designed to connect medical records and wellness applications with isolated health memory.

name: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Health, an encrypted workspace designed to connect m
content: OpenAI has launched ChatGPT Health, an encrypted workspace designed to connect medical records and wellness applications with isolated health memory.

payload.content: ChatGPT Health currently serves over 40 million weekly users who utilize it to inquire about symptoms, test results, treatments, insurance navigation, and after-hours care.

name: ChatGPT Health currently serves over 40 million weekly users who utilize it to i
content: ChatGPT Health currently serves over 40 million weekly users who utilize it to inquire about symptoms, test results, treatments, insurance navigation, and after-hours care.

payload.content: ChatGPT Health is particularly used in rural and underserved areas for healthcare inquiries.

name: ChatGPT Health is particularly used in rural and underserved areas for healthcar
content: ChatGPT Health is particularly used in rural and underserved areas for healthcare inquiries.

payload.content: Discussions surrounding ChatGPT Health focus on its potential for clinical adoption, streamlining care, and building a health-data moat, alongside concerns about privacy, regulation, and startup disruption.

name: Discussions surrounding ChatGPT Health focus on its potential for clinical adopt
content: Discussions surrounding ChatGPT Health focus on its potential for clinical adoption, streamlining care, and building a health-data moat, alongside concerns about privacy, regulation, and startup disruption.
